/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with buildings and trees, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
